SqlString.Sql: SELECT Beleg_ID, Seiten, Ablagecode FROM Dyn_Beleg WHERE OriginalFileName is null and Ablagecode not like '999999:\'
SELECT Top 10 Beleg_ID, Seiten, Ablagecode FROM Dyn_Beleg WHERE OriginalFileName is not null and Ablagecode not like '999999:\' and Erfassungsdatum >= '2018-12-14'
SELECT Top 10 Beleg_ID, Seiten, Ablagecode FROM Dyn_Beleg WHERE OriginalFileName is null and Ablagecode not like '999999:\'
SELECT Top 10 Beleg_ID, Seiten, Ablagecode FROM Dyn_Beleg WHERE OriginalFileName is null and Ablagecode not like '999999:\'
SELECT Top 100 Beleg_ID, Seiten, Ablagecode FROM Dyn_Beleg WHERE OriginalFileName is not null and Ablagecode not like '999999:\' and Erfassungsdatum >= '2019-08-01'
SELECT Top 100 Beleg_ID, Seiten, Ablagecode FROM Dyn_Beleg WHERE Beleg_ID > 0 AND Ablagecode not like '999999:\'
